contentList.content: Prevent AI-controlled characters from using items in other party member's inventories.
If enabled, party members under AI control will be restricted to only using the amount of consumables in the slider below per turn. This is to prevent the AI from chugging potions.
If [Key:LLPARTYAI_LimitConsumableUsageDisabled:Limit Consumable Usage] is enabled, this is the number of consumeables to limit the AI to each turn.
Character is deciding their own actions in combat.
Clear AI control from all characters under your control.
Party members under AI control will have their archetype changed to one that prioritizes some specific behavior (healing/resurrecting allies, avoiding reflection damage, buffing on the first turn).
